https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aKgshqVFvuzMl89YMNdO9pd8eFi.jpg Based on the wraparound story penned by Clive Barker in the author's "Books of Blood" collection, the story centers on a paranormal expert who, while investigating a gruesome slaying, finds a house that is at the intersection of "highways" transporting souls to the afterlife. Book of Blood
